original_text: And they watched him, and sent forth spies, which should feign themselves just men, that they might take hold of his words, that so they might deliver him unto the power and authority of the governor.
korean_text: 이에 그들이 엿보다가 예수를 총독의 다스림과 권세 아래에 넘기려 하여 정탐들을 보내어 그들로 스스로 의인인 체하며 예수의 말을 책잡게 하니

sentences.original_text: which should feign themselves just men
that they might take hold of his words
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그들이 그의 말을 붙잡으려 함이라

sentences.original_text: that so they might deliver him
unto the power and authority of the governor
